caption: A high-energy drum and bass track with rapid breakbeats, heavy sub-bass, and chopped vocal samples. Features aggressive synth stabs, rolling percussion, and an intense build-drop structure designed for the dancefloor.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Pressure rising can you feel it now
Bass is dropping gonna show you how
Speakers shaking walls are caving in
Let the madness begin

[Build]
Three two one let it drop
Once we start we never stop

[Drop]
Run it back run it back
Feel the bass attack
Run it back run it back
Never looking back

[Verse 2]
Adrenaline is pumping through my veins
Breaking free from all the chains
Lost inside the rhythm and the sound
Feet don't touch the ground

[Build]
Three two one let it drop
Once we start we never stop

[Drop]
Run it back run it back
Feel the bass attack
Run it back run it back
Never looking back

[Breakdown]

[Final Drop]
Run it back!
